title: Link2SD+ Plus 3.5.2 Patched [Fixed]
description:
Sorry, I didn't include the install instructions in the other release.


Instructions:

Your phone must be rooted.

Install Lucky Patcher. The latest lucky patcher will not patch link2sd correctly.

Install the latest version of Link2SD from the play store.

Lucky Patcher has a working patch for version 3.5.2. Run it, select Link2SD, Patches, Custom Patch. Apply the patch, you should get a 70% patch success. Then launch Link2SD and all features should be unlocked.

Note that on my kitkat phone the function to "Create Link" and selecting to Link App Data, the fourth option, causes some programs to run very slowly. Angry Birds Go works well, with all data linked, but sometimes crashes. Be sure you have a class 10 sd card
